result.eng: The article was written by the president.
result.ga: an t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-alt
result.orig: an t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-alt
result.html: an t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-altThe article was written by the president.
result.ponchtml: an t-uaċtarán a scríoḃ an t-altThe article was written by the president.

result.eng: I would like to introduce you to the President.
result.ga: ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don uachtarán
result.orig: ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don uachtarán
result.html: ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don uachtaránI would like to introduce you to the President.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ liom tú a ċur in aiṫne don uaċtaránI would like to introduce you to the President.

result.eng: I met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ga: bhuail mé leis an taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an uachtarán chomh maith
result.orig: bhuail mé leis an taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an uachtarán chomh maith

result.ponchtml: ḃuail mé leis an taoiseaċ agus ḃuail mé leis an uaċtarán ċoṁ maiṫI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.

result.ga: cheap siad ina uachtarán é

result.html: cheap siad ina uachtarán éThey appointed him president.

result.eng: The President may be impeached for misconduct.
result.ga: féadfar an tuachtarán a tháinseamh as ucht mí-iompair
result.orig: féadfar an tuachtarán a tháinseamh as ucht mí-iompair

result.eng: I cannot say that in the presence of the president!
result.ga: ní féidir liom é sin a rá i láthair an uachtaráin
result.orig: ní féidir liom é sin a rá i láthair an uachtaráin
result.html: ní féidir liom é sin a rá i láthair an uachtaráinI cannot say that in the presence of the president!
result.ponchtml: ní féidir liom é sin a rá i láṫair an uaċtaráinI cannot say that in the presence of the president!

result.html: toghadh ina uachtarán éHe was elected President.
result.ponchtml: toġaḋ ina uaċtarán éHe was elected President.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an uachtaráin john f kennedy
